parameter.name: mandrill.fromEmail
parameter.description: Email address of the issue assigner.

parameter.name: serviceOrProjectTitle
parameter.description: Service name or Project name of the issue related to.

parameter.name: issueAssigneeFirstName
parameter.description: First name of the issue assignee.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: Source name of the issue (Possible values are 'Bugerd' and 'Pagerduty').

parameter.name: priorityId
parameter.description: ID of the Producteev task priority.

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Assignee (',get-property('issueAssigneeEmail'),') is reminded about the overdue task successfully.')
